mapper.insert: insert into member_table(memberEmail, memberPassword, memberName, memberBirth, memberMobile) values (#{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberBirth}, #{memberMobile})
mapper.select: select * from member_table where memberEmail=#{memberEmail} and memberPassword=#{memberPassword}
mapper.update: update member_table set memberName=#{memberName}, memberMobile=#{memberMobile} where id=#{id}
